reviews.text: No time for when the station opens. Absolutely No information on delays and whatever. And information on the station  close. The 4 Day old brochure i got handed from personal, did not have the correct time

Great station! Original architecture, many shops and services. Information kiosk is in the middle of the station hall.

The Stansted Airport is just 50 min away.

Very central location. You can walk to the Tower of London and Thames River in 15 minutes.

I unexpectedly found this place near the Liverpool station. Impressive and at the same time cosy combination of steel, glass, wood and -  bamboo! Little nearby cafes with their tables also offer a nice place to rest, have a snack and pleasant chat. Also you can find this as well as nearby "talking statue" near the Liverpool station. London skyscrapers can be admired there, too!

Huge station with plenty of interconnecting underground lines. A great choice of places to eat or grab a snack or to have a browse around for last minute gift ideas. Spacious and informative main concourse area. Architecturally interesting inside, the concourse is spacious and light, all tastefully modernised over the years.

Great station to get connections to other main stations.  The architecture is beautiful and can accommodate loads of people.  There are information centers around and staff are friendly and helpful at anytime.  Toilets are free of charge and there are water fountains to fill up water.  Plenty of trains here and it can be confusing but follow directions and itll be easier.
